client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

link_correlation_id.description: A `link_correlation_id` from a received OAuth redirect URI callback
